title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Shwetank Kumar
text:
I’m a physicist, engineering exec, investor. Here’s my story:

Born and raised in NCR, India. Delhi native, I live in SF.
Got hooked on science early, did my B.Tech in EE from IIT, PhD in Applied Physics from Caltech. Learned business by working at startups (Orbital Insight, Turo, Achieve) and getting MBA at Wharton.
Internet has been my playground and I specialize in Data and AI related games. Some systems I have enjoyed building over time:

Turo: ML based risk framework
Orbital Insight: Geospatial analytics platform at Orbital Insight
Intel: universal stylus initiative specification

I founded a bootstrapped company to help data teams optimize their Snowflake spend




Built AI systems that crunch petabytes of data across image, text, and tabular formats
Scaled these systems to serve millions of customers simultaneously at Achieve and Turo
Created Orbital Insight’s flagship product for analyzing satellite imagery, growing it from $0 to $10M
Doubled conversion rates and slashed acquisition costs using AI-driven personalization
Led teams of 120+ brilliant minds in data science, engineering, and analytics





PyTorch, Hugging Face, Langchain, Pydantic
GCP, Snowflake
Anything that pushes the boundaries of what’s possible with data





AI and machine learning are reshaping every industry - get on board or get left behind
The best AI solutions come from a deep understanding of both technology and business needs
Speed matters - deploy fast, learn faster
Great teams are the secret sauce to any successful project
Ethical considerations should be baked into AI development from day one





Founded and chair the due diligence committee for Invest in Data
Committed $100K+ of my own capital to shape the next generation of AI infrastructure
Always on the lookout for startups pushing the boundaries of what’s possible with data and AI

[Space for startups invested in]




Writing about AI, tech leadership, and data science on this blog
Sharing insights on LinkedIn
Tinkering with code on GitHub
Speaking at conferences about the future of AI and data
Mentoring the next generation of data scientists and AI engineers

Got an exciting AI project or a game-changing startup idea? Let’s talk: shwetank.kumar@gmail.com
Remember: The laws of physics are the only real limit. Everything else is just waiting to be disrupted by the right application of AI and data.
